title: Example apps - ErgoDocs
summary: The following Mosaik apps are open-sourced can be used to take inspiration from how to build own Mosaik apps.

sections.heading: Example apps#
sections.content: The following Mosaik apps are open-sourced can be used to take inspiration from how to build own Mosaik apps.

sections.heading: Spring and Kotlin DSL#
sections.content:
Mosaik tutorial example app - Example app for the tutorial series
Age USD demo - Example UI showing AgeUSD state and to mint and redeem SigRSV/SigUSD
Mosaik view elements and actions - Showcasing all available view elements and actions
Burn tokens demo - UI for burning tokens, fully functional with ErgoPay
NFT marketplace - Example UI for an NFT marketplace
Obol Flip - Decentralized coin flip, downloadable Mosaik client

sections.heading: Spring and Java#
sections.content: LazyBox, Alignments - Example app building UI in pure Java

sections.heading: Spring, Java and Freemarker#
sections.content: Visitor list - Example app building UI and processing data using json templates and Freemarker
